Package ohos.accessibility.ability

Class AccessibleAbility

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.app.AbilityContext
      • ohos.aafwk.ability.Ability
        • ohos.accessibility.ability.AccessibleAbility
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILifecycle, Context

    public abstract class AccessibleAbility
extends Ability
    Provides capabilities for you to develop your own accessibility application.

    The accessibility application helps users use their devices and programs easily. AccessibilityEventInfo will be called to send events when the UI status has any changes, for example, a button is clicked or focus is gained. You can inherit this class to handle your interested events.

    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Accessibility#ABILITY

    • Method Detail

      • onAccessibilityEvent

        public abstract void onAccessibilityEvent​(AccessibilityEventInfo eventInfo)
        Called when an accessibility event occurs.

        When receiving an accessibility event, for example, AccessibilityEventInfo#TYPE_VIEW_CLICKED_EVENT, you can implement this method to handle the event.

        Parameters:
        eventInfo - Indicates the accessibility event information.
        Since:
        3

      • onInterrupt

        public abstract void onInterrupt​()
        Called when the accessibility service is interrupted.

        You can implement this method to handle the interruption.

        Since:
        3

      • disableAbility

        public final void disableAbility​()
        Disables the accessibility service.

        After the accessibility service is disabled by this method, it becomes disabled on the UI settings accordingly.

        Since:
        3

      • onKeyPressEvent

        protected boolean onKeyPressEvent​(KeyEvent keyEvent)
        Called when a key event occurs, for example, a user presses the key to increase or decrease the volume.

        Changing the keyEvent value does not affect other services that receive this event. The return value determines whether this event has been consumed by the current control. You can implement this method to filter key events.

        Parameters:
        keyEvent - Indicates the key event to send.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the event has been consumed; returns false otherwise. The event that has been consumed will not be sent to the application.
        Since:
        3

      • getSoftKeyBoardController

        public final SoftKeyBoardController getSoftKeyBoardController​()
        Obtains the controller for the soft keyboard.
        Returns:
        Returns a SoftKeyBoardController instance.

      • getDisplayResizeController

        public final DisplayResizeController getDisplayResizeController​()
        Obtains the controller for display resizing operations.
        Returns:
        Returns a DisplayResizeController instance.

      • getDisplayResizeController

        public final DisplayResizeController getDisplayResizeController​(int displayId)
        Obtains the controller for display resizing operations.
        Parameters:
        displayId - Indicates the ID of the display.
        Returns:
        Returns a DisplayResizeController instance.

      • onAbilityConnected

        protected void onAbilityConnected​()
        Called when your accessibility service is successfully connected to the OS. You can implement this method to perform subsequent initialization operations.
        Since:
        3

      • onGesture

        protected boolean onGesture​(int gestureId)
        Called when a user performs a specified gesture on the device that your accessibility application has requested to be in touch exploration mode.
        Parameters:
        gestureId - Indicates the gesture ID.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the gesture has been handled; returns false otherwise.

      • gestureSimulate

        public final boolean gestureSimulate​(List<GesturePathDefine> gesturePathDefineList,
                                     GestureResultListener listener)
        Sends customized gestures to the screen.
        Parameters:
        gesturePathDefineList - Indicates the path of the customized gestures to send.
        listener - Indicates the listener used to observe the gesture sending result.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the gestures are successfully sent; returns false otherwise.

      • getWindows

        public List<AccessibilityWindow> getWindows​()
        Obtains the list of interactive windows on the device, in the layers they are visible to users.

        You need to configure the permission to search for the window content in the configuration file.

        Returns:
        Returns the window list.
        Since:
        3

      • getRootAccessibilityInfo

        public Optional<AccessibilityInfo> getRootAccessibilityInfo​()
        Obtains information about the accessibility root node.

        This method will search all windows for view information about the accessibility root node, so that you need to configure the permission to search for the window content in the configuration file.

        Returns:
        Returns information about the accessibility root node.
        Since:
        3

      • gainFocus

        public Optional<AccessibilityInfo> gainFocus​(int focusType)
        Obtains the accessibility node that gains the focus.
        Parameters:
        focusType - Indicates the focus type.
        Returns:
        Returns the focused accessibility node.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        AccessibilityInfo.FOCUS_TYPE_INPUT, AccessibilityInfo.FOCUS_TYPE_ACCESSIBILITY

      • performCommonAction

        public final boolean performCommonAction​(int action)
        Executes a specified action.

        This action can be executed without any user operations, for example, going to the previous step, going to the home page, and taking a screenshot.

        Parameters:
        action - Indicates the action type.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the action is successfully executed; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        GLOBAL_ACTION_BACK, GLOBAL_ACTION_HOME, GLOBAL_ACTION_RECENTS, GLOBAL_ACTION_NOTIFICATIONS, GLOBAL_ACTION_QUICK_SETTINGS, GLOBAL_ACTION_POWER_DIALOG, GLOBAL_ACTION_TOGGLE_SPLIT_SCREEN, GLOBAL_ACTION_LOCK_SCREEN, GLOBAL_ACTION_TAKE_SCREENSHOT

      • onConnect

        public final IRemoteObject onConnect​(Intent intent)
        Description copied from class: Ability
        Called back when a Service ability is first connected to an ability.

        This method is called only on Service abilities. You can override the method to return the proxy of a Service ability.

        Overrides:
        onConnect in class Ability
        Parameters:
        intent - Indicates connection information about the Service ability.
        Returns:
        Returns the proxy of the Service ability.
